comment: Dr. McKee is a solid choice for Music Education, however I would not tell him if you took music classes before his class. He seems to personally get the most out of the class when he believes that everybody is a beginner. He is very kind however and knowledgeable about the subject.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Music class is fun and you will learn a lot about the pedagogy as well as how to teach music lessons. Great Professor!

Super nice guy!  Great musician.  What other class can you sing children's songs, play the recorder, and teach kid dances?  So fun!  Not a ton of work, but you will learn a lot about music.  Attendance is mandatory, but he is very easy going.  Take him!  You will enjoy it!
Very nice guy.  Easy class.  He really makes music easy for those who do not have a music background.  Extremely fair.
Very Very nice Professor.  He is Great.  You wont regret taking him for music.  Attendance is mandatory and he is extremely fair when it comes to grading. Highly recommend Professor McKee.
